stimulusHtml: In 1815 the immediate political result of the French Revolution and the Napoleonic Wars was

features.html: The following question refers to the topic of crisis, upheaval, and revolution in the eighteenth century.

choicesHtml: the reestablishment of conservative monarchies across much of Europe
the adoption of republican forms of government by most European states
the recreation of the Holy Roman Empire
the unification of Italy and Germany as nation-states
